Please refer to scans for conditions, will definitely listen to offers, especially on multiples across my other threads. All prices are PP Gift- I will consider taking personal checks as well (will hold the item until the check clears)


Will ship internationally if the buyer covers shipping cost (Must have some sort of DC# for orders over $100)

PM Here or email to [url]smanzari1@gmail.com[/url]

1909 t206 Christy Mathewson PSA 2 MK (has a signature of one of the original owners on the back- not the Baseball player, J.Dugan) -- $OLD
